text.english: This automated check-in process is designed to save you time and make Event Check-In easier than ever! Here is what you'll need to do:
Your event materials will be mailed to you if you complete Event Check-In by June 12. After this time, your event materials will be available to pick up on-site the morning of Saturday, June 24.
We are only able to mail check-in packets to Canadian addresses. If you live outside Canada, your packet will be available for easy pick-up on Saturday morning.

Due to team fundraising, those Walkers who have not met their individual fundraising minimum by Saturday morning will have their eligibility to Walk calculated based on their team’s fundraising totals. If your team has not raised sufficient funds to get you to $1,500, you will be required to turn in additional donations or complete a Delayed Self-Pledge in order to Walk.
